entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,0,70001}That sign says "Ueno Station"...{F801}Is that correct? It's written in the{F801}mystic script...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,70002}Mind if I weigh in, Master {F843,0}?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,70003}I'm detecting a Terminal in the{F801}underground town.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,70002}Mind if I weigh in, Master {F843,0}?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,70003}I'm detecting a Terminal in the{F801}underground town.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,70004}The Unclean Ones build their towns{F801}below ground? Very odd...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,70004}The Unclean Ones build their towns{F801}below ground? Very odd...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Smirking man\0{F87A,79}I might not look like it, but I got{F801}a good eye for people. And you look{F801}like you've had a long journey.{F801}{F802}There's a {F804,5}Hunter Association{F804,0} in this{F801}underground district, so why don't{F801}you head there to cool your heels?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Smirking man\0{F87A,79}I might not look like it, but I got{F801}a good eye for people. And you look{F801}like you've had a long journey.{F801}{F802}There's a {F804,5}Hunter Association{F804,0} in this{F801}underground district, so why don't{F801}you head there to cool your heels?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Smirking man\0{F87A,79}{F813,1,403231}Oh, and don't worry about paying me{F801}a tip. I already took it. See ya!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Smirking man\0{F87A,79}{F813,1,403231}Oh, and don't worry about paying me{F801}a tip. I already took it. See ya!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The smirking man ran off with{F801}incredible speed!{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The smirking man ran off with{F801}incredible speed!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,1,400103}*gasp* I'm missing 10,000 Macca.{F801}I never even noticed it...{F801}{F802}It must've been that man just now.{F801}How shameful, that such outlaws are{F801}left unchecked...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,1,400103}*gasp* I'm missing 10,000 Macca.{F801}I never even noticed it...{F801}{F802}It must've been that man just now.{F801}How shameful, that such outlaws are{F801}left unchecked...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,1,400203}What's this!? It's gone! I had 100{F801}Macca I was saving!{F801}{F802}It must've been that man. How dare he!{F801}Petty theft is one thing, but for him{F801}to target me is too much!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F813,1,400203}What's this!? It's gone! I had 100{F801}Macca I was saving!{F801}{F802}It must've been that man. How dare he!{F801}Petty theft is one thing, but for him{F801}to target me is too much!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,1,400306}Good heavens...! 10,000 Macca has{F801}been stolen from my wallet.{F801}{F802}It must have been that man. This is{F801}unbelievable... Was he never{F801}disciplined by his parents?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,1,400306}Good heavens...! 10,000 Macca has{F801}been stolen from my wallet.{F801}{F802}It must have been that man. This is{F801}unbelievable... Was he never{F801}disciplined by his parents?{F801}
